description:
A 10-speed chain from Shimano’s Tiagra groupset.

  • Unidirectional (asymmetrical) design uses different inner and outer plate chamfers and dimensions to accommodate the different shifting requirements when moving the chain inward or outward
  • Compatible with Dura-Ace 7900, Ultegra 6700 and 105
  • Super narrow profile designed HG 10-speed road transmissions
  • Does not work with Shimano 10-speed MTB drivetrains
name: Shimano Taigra CN-4601 10-Speed Chain
